title: How to Offer Color Consultation with AI Tools
description: Help customers choose colors using AI visualization tools — a great differentiator for painters.
requirements: Familiarity with paint brand apps or AI tools

steps.title: Use paint brand visualizer apps
steps.description: Major paint brands offer free color visualization.
substeps: Sherwin-Williams ColorSnap: Take a photo, try colors on walls
Benjamin Moore Color Portfolio: Similar functionality
Behr ColorSmart: Works with Home Depot colors
All are free on iPhone and Android
steps.tip: Use the brand you actually stock — makes ordering easier.

steps.title: Take good photos of the space
substeps: Take photos in natural daylight
Get the whole wall in frame
Minimize shadows and glare
Take multiple angles — some work better than others

steps.title: Use the visualizer with your customer
substeps: Open the app and upload their photo
Tap on the wall to select the area to change
Try colors they're considering
Show them 3-5 options side by side
steps.tip: Let them hold the phone and swipe through colors — it's engaging.

steps.title: Suggest complementary colors
steps.description: Add value beyond just the color they asked about.
substeps: Use the app's 'coordinating colors' feature
Suggest trim colors that work with their choice
Recommend accent wall options
This often leads to bigger jobs

steps.title: Try AI color tools for more options
steps.description: Newer AI tools can do even more.
substeps: ChatGPT can suggest color palettes for their style
Prompt: 'Suggest paint color palettes for a modern farmhouse living room'
Then visualize those suggestions in the paint brand app
Some AI image tools can recolor photos directly

steps.title: Make it part of your quote process
steps.description: Color consultation is a selling point.
substeps: Mention 'free color consultation' in your marketing
During estimates, offer to visualize colors
Send visualizations in your quote email
This differentiates you from painters who just slap on paint

successMessage: You can now offer color consultation! Customers love seeing their choices before committing.
proTips: Save visualizations and send them to the customer — they'll share with family
Learn about color theory basics — warm vs cool, complementary colors
Upsell: 'A lot of people end up doing an accent wall here too'
